post:
**vServer.site KVM vServer**
The KVM virtual machines hosted on Nodes, there are connected to multiple 10G to our Core Switches. Now are all vServer with pure SSD Harddrives

**General Functions**
KVM Full Virtualisation
Start, Stop, Reinstall over Control Panel
Rescue System
Add own ISO
1x IPv4 + IPv6 (PTR can change self)
DDOS Protection

**Datacenter**
Düsseldorf, Germany

**Available Images**
Debian 8,9,10
CentOS 6,7,8
Ubuntu 16.04,18.04,19.04
Fedora, Suse...

**BF KVM Mini:** 1 vCPU Core, 1 GB RAM, 5 GB SSD, shared 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic incl.
Price: € 12,00 / annually
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=77
Price will after renew the same!

**Other Levels:**
KVM Ultra: 2 vCPU Core, 2 GB RAM, 10 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic incl.
Price: € 3,00 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=118

KVM Large: 2 vCPU Core, 4 GB RAM, 20 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 2 TB Traffic incl.
Price: € 5,99 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=119


See other Levels on our Website https://vserver.site/de/vserver_kvm_duesseldorf.html?utm_source=LET.
